T Given get '/'
T When navigate to search page
T click on 'recipe.search'
T wait until 'recipetype.search' to be visible
T Then search recipe 'breakfast pizza'
T click on 'recipetype.search'
T sendKeys 'breakfast pizza' into 'recipetype.search'
T Then select a recipe
T click on 'pizzaRecipeImg.click'
T Then save a recipe
T click on 'saveReceipeBtn.click'

T assert 'saveMessageText.verify' is visible
